response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the top cabinet. The next step is to take out the platter from the top cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the fries and burger from the fridge
(3) Heat the fries and burger
(4) Open the top cabinet
(5) Take out the platter from the top cabinet
(6) Place the heated fries and burger on the platter
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Take out the platter from the top cabinet
    platter = registry(env, "platter_86")
    EasyGrasp(robot, platter)
    donothing(env)
